page.title: 09INSTOW PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school building is just over 100 years old with an additional modern classroom. At present there are just over 80 children on the roll. There are 3 teachers teaching the age range of 5 to 11. We have a school secretary, a caretaker, a cook and 2 kitchen assistants. The children come to school from the surrounding area, many of them being brought by their parents in a car. There is a small school field adjacent to the playground and also an open air swimming pool. The school has many visitors. It is open from 9 o'clock until half past three.
